{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BEC Technologies |model=MX-210 |revision=NPV |series=N300 |asin= |fcc_date=06/29/2018 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Billion |type=LTE router, 4G LTE router |fcc_id=QI3BIL-MX210NPV, XMR201607EC25V |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7525;MEDIATEK, MT7525GIT, 1718-BMTH, CTPCWW63, DTPCSA92; |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm |cpu2_model=MDM9307;QUALCOMM, MDM9307, 0VV, FU7502HN, U075000; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |fla2=512 |fla2_brand=Nanya |fla2_model=NM1482KSLAXCL-3B |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG |ram2=256 |ram2_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NM1482KSLAXCL-3B |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7592;MEDIATEK, MT7592N, 1742-BMJL, CTPG4N03; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Quectel EC25-V |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (LCC) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=MDM9307 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=LTE |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=LTE, TR-069, mini SIM Card slot, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:04:ED, |oui_eth=00:04:ED }} {{TagLine|4G/LTE Broadband Router with PoE}}
The non-PoE RJ-45 port can be configured for WAN or LAN. {{See also|BEC Technologies MX-230 M1|Quectel}} <!--:FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/XMR201605EC25A XMR201605EC25A] (07/18/2016)-->
*LTE Module: ''[[Quectel EC25-V]]'' ([[Qualcomm]] MDM9307) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/XMR201607EC25V XMR201607EC25V] (09/19/2016) - U.FL :is included with the product (CPU2, FLA2, RAM2) *''Nanya'' NM1482KSLAXCL-3B (MCP Combo Chip) :Flash: 4Gb (NAND) + RAM: 2Gb (LPDDR/BGA)
